title: 山田太郎ものがたり 1 [Yamada Tarou Monogatari 1]
description: 山田太郎、高一。成績優秀、眉目秀麗、スポーツ万能。唯一の欠点は貧乏なこと。そんな彼に渡された白い粉とは？　待望の第一巻!!With their father going away for an extended time without any warning whatsoever, the Yamadas have to get by on their own. Tarou, the eldest son, carries the biggest burden of all: supporting his large family. Of course, Tarou's money problems are overshadowed by his appearance, as many girls and even guys trample all over each other to get his attention. Experience the joys and tears of being poor AND beautiful through the life of the Yamadas!
author: Ai Morinaga
